author: julianfoad
msg: Simplify the IPv6 detection code slightly, removing a variable.

author: fitz
msg: Further cleanup from the locking branch: Move array_join out of
hooks.c, into svn_string.c, and rename it to svn_cstring_join.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/hooks.c (array_join): Moved out of here and
renamed to svn_cstring_join.  Updated all callers.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make 'svn copy WC WC' reinstate the hiddenness of .svn files created
in the copy destination, and combined several recursive tree walks
into one.  While crawling, also delete lockstuffs from the copy target
-- those tokens are meaningless.  Besides fixing other bugs, this also
scratches the itch noted in issue #1739.

author: sunny256
msg: Recommend the use of two commits in TRANSLATING when updating .po files.
(Updating existing po files): Add a recommendation about using two
